episodes.synopsis: Chris reads the book "Rico, The Very Helpful Robot!" to Elmo, Telly and Rosita, who decide to become robots to help Chris at Hooper's store.
episodes.title: The Help-O-Bots

episodes.synopsis: Scientists Elmo, Rosita, and Telly set out to find the answer to a very pressing question: Does everyone take a bath?
episodes.title: The Happy Scientists

episodes.synopsis: Telly Monster and Baby Bear report from Sesame Street's Fairy Tale Science Fair, where fairy tale characters solve their problems using science.
episodes.title: Sesame Street Fairy Tale Science Fair

episodes.synopsis: With Leela's help, Elmo and Zoe experiment with designing a boat for Zoe's pet rock, Rocco.
episodes.title: Rocco's Boat

episodes.synopsis: The Three Little Pigs are building a house to enter into a contest but the Big Bad Wolf claims that he’ll be able to blow it down.
episodes.title: Best House of the Year

episodes.synopsis: Oscar’s plan backfires when he tries to create a painting so ugly that it will make everyone on Sesame Street mad.
episodes.title: Finishing the Splat

video.title: Creativity and Imagination
video.synopsis: Creativity and imagination help kids learn about the world around them, so all aboard the imagination train with Elmo and his Sesame Street pals.
